underlying_goal: To research and understand black-box detection baselines for AI sandbagging by reviewing literature on auditing games, with the ultimate goal of implementing a multi-turn interrogation method.
primary_success: Claude sustained a long, complex research exploration, systematically analyzing multiple research papers to identify and synthesize information about detection baselines for AI auditing.
brief_summary: This was an extensive research session focused on AI safety. The user and Claude collaboratively reviewed multiple papers on auditing games and sandbagging detection to identify black-box detection baselines. The session progressed from literature review to planning an implementation of a multi-turn interrogation detection method.
